mapper.select: SELECT tu.id , tu.name , tu.learning_start_date , DATEDIFF(now(), tu.learning_start_date) as elapsed_days , ROUND((sum(pr.achieved_learning_hours) / #{sum_learning_minutes}) * 100, 1) as progress_rate FROM progress_rates pr LEFT JOIN team_users tu ON tu.id = pr.team_users_id WHERE tu.delete_flg = 0 AND pr.report_date = #{report_date} GROUP BY pr.team_users_id ORDER BY tu.learning_start_date , pr.team_users_id ;
